arts.ttl: MOTD analysis: Everton penalty VAR intervention 'mind-boggling'
arts.sum: Ex-England captain Alan Shearer reflects on the controversial penalty decision during Everton's Premier League match against Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Ashley Young penalty verdict delivered to Premier League referee as Everton draw
arts.sum: Everton drew with Manchester United in their final meeting at Goodison Park

arts.ttl: Bruno Fernandes involved in 'pitchside row' with Everton legend during Man Utd draw
arts.sum: Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes took exception to a playful gesture from Everton legend Derek Mountfield just before the second half of Saturday's 2-2 draw at Goodison Park

arts.ttl: Everton and Man Utd given new penalty verdict as ex-PGMOL boss steps in
arts.sum: Former PGMOL chief Keith Hackett has had his say on the controversial end to Everton's draw with Manchester United after the Toffees were awarded and then denied a penalty

arts.ttl: Man United head coach Ruben Amorim explains major Alejandro Garnacho call against Everton
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim explains his decision to leave Alejandro Garnacho out of the starting XI against Everton on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Ashley Young channels Jose Mourinho with response to Man Utd penalty controversy
arts.sum: Everton were bafflingly robbed of a penalty late on against Manchester United after Ashley Young was taken down and the ex Red Devil has offered an amusing take on Andy Madley’s decision

arts.ttl: David Moyes doesn't hold back on VAR after Everton controversially denied Man Utd win
arts.sum: Everton thought they had a chance to claim a last-gasp victory against Manchester United from the penalty spot, only for a VAR overturn to deny David Moyes' team

arts.ttl: Mike Dean immediately backtracks on controversial Everton vs Man Utd decision
arts.sum: Everton had a penalty overturned during stoppage time of their thrilling draw with Manchester United, with Mike Dean changing his mind on whether that decision was the correct call

arts.ttl: Man Utd fight back from TWO DOWN to draw at Everton
arts.sum: Bruno Fernandes pulled one back with a stunning free-kick in the second half, and almost scored a late winner, though he was denied by Jordan Pickford . Manuel Ugarte’s first Manchester United goal finished off a comeback to salvage a 2-2 draw against Everton at Goodison Park.

arts.ttl: The Verdict: Man Utd first-half display a real worry
arts.sum: Sky Sports' Peter Stevenson discusses Everton's 2-2 draw with Manchester United at Goodison Park.
